__e: Just so you know, I was willing to go to 300, since it was life and death and all.
There is not much more that we can do unless you are willing to help yourself.
It's not about what I like, it's about what people up there are willing to accept.
If you are not willing to do that, then you shouldn't be working with me and you probably shouldn't be a surgeon.
If a dream has to be dreamt, and you're not there to dream it...
But, believe it or not, there are those of your brethren who are willing to do such things.
And I'm willing to do the work to fix whatever was wrong because you're the person that I love.
The point is, after what happened, people are finally willing to do something.
I've been willing to do all the other things you've asked of me, but this... This is more than I can endure.
With all due respect sir, I am unwilling to stand down because if nothing is done my partner dies.
There's someone out there for me, someone I love very much, and I will not lose him.
But if a child is coming... and if you can risk your heart again, then so can I.
